name: BAE Systems
membership:
Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe (ASD)

goal: BAE Systems is a global defence and security company with approximately 82,000 employees worldwide. The Company delivers a full range of products and services for air, land and naval forces, as well as advanced electronics, security, information technology solutions and support services.
interests: Competition, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: EDAP instruments, EUGS, defence initiatives, Research
